body:
Tests are failing on Head of `master`. I'm building on Windows 10 with MS Visual Studio 2017. The command line I'm using is: ``` test_bitcoin.exe -r confirm ``` The tests are failing just in `x64 Debug` mode. The full output is: Edit: `x86 Debug` mode is also failing ``` C:\_D\Repos\bitcoin\build_msvc\x64\Debug>test_bitcoin.exe -r confirm Running 356 test cases... unknown location(0): fatal error: in "net_tests/caddrdb_read_corrupted": stack overflow c:\_d\repos\bitcoin\src\test\net_tests.cpp(165): last checkpoint *** 1 failure is detected in the test module "Bitcoin Core Test Suite" Detected memory leaks! Dumping objects -> {13091797} normal block at 0x000002D5726909A0, 16 bytes long. Data: 58 57 A0 E6 EC 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 {13091796} normal block at 0x000002D5726447F0, 112 bytes long. title: net_tests/caddrdb_read_corrupted failure: stack overflow
